articles.title: Govt returns bank guarantees to Voda Idea, Airtel - Economic Times
articles.description: The department didnt mention the specific amounts worth of BGs that were returned. But an official said that BGs worth Rs15,000 crore were returned to Vodafone Idea and worth Rs7,000 crore were returned to Airtel.

articles.title: Tatas replenish ecommerce war chest with Rs 5,882 crore - Economic Times
articles.description: The latest funding takes the total investment into Tata Digital to Rs 11,872 crore in 2021-22, helping it achieve a war chest to take on established ecommerce rivals Amazon and Walmart-owned Flipkart in the country.
